comments:
The followign stacktrace appeared in an e-mail someone sent me. The problme is that the shutdown of TeamUIPlugin does a Team.getSynchronizeManager. This may be the first call to get the manager and hence may cause classes to be loaded. The code should be refactored to avoid loading the class on shutdown.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.osgi 4 0 2006-06-05 14:15:28.454 
!MESSAGE Error while stopping "org.eclipse.team.ui_3.2.0.I200605181830". 
!STACK 0

        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:280) 
        at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:977)

Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org.eclipse.ui.Saveable
